api_list.name: Manage Alerts

required_parameters.name: action

api_list.name: List of Games
api_list.description: Get a list of games that contain a given title or matches steamAppID. Response includes the cheapest current deal for each game.

optional_parameters.name: title
optional_parameters.description: Search for a game by title

optional_parameters.name: exact
optional_parameters.description:
Default `0`

Flag to allow only exact string match for `title` parameter

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description:
Default `60`

The maximum number of games to return, up to `60`

optional_parameters.name: steamAppID
optional_parameters.description: Search for a game by Steam’s AppID - e.g. http://store.steampowered.com/app/35140/

api_list.name: List of Deals
api_list.description:
Get a paged list of deals matching any number of criteria, all the filtering parameters are optional.

The deal object is what drives most of what you see on the site. They are price + metadata properties for games for a given store. All dealID’s are encoded on the server. On your website/app, you will use the redirect page to link users to a specific deal:

> https://www.cheapshark.com/redirect?dealID={id}

**Important Note**: The redirect page is not an API endpoint and is not designed for automated access. It is purely a way to link your end users to deals.

The deal rating property provides a quick way to compare how 'good' a deal is. It is normalized on a scale from 0 to 10.

optional_parameters.name: lowerPrice
optional_parameters.description:
Default `0`

Only returns deals with a price *greater than* this value

optional_parameters.name: steamRating
optional_parameters.description: Minimum Steam reviews rating for a game

optional_parameters.name: title
optional_parameters.description: Looks for the string contained anywhere in the game name

optional_parameters.name: steamAppID
optional_parameters.description: Look for deals on specific games, comma separated list of Steam App ID

optional_parameters.name: desc
optional_parameters.description:
Default `0`

Determines sort direction

optional_parameters.name: output
optional_parameters.description: Option to output deals in `RSS` format (overrides page number/size to `0`/`100`)

optional_parameters.name: steamworks
optional_parameters.description:
Default `0`

Flag to include only deals that redeem on Steam (best guess, depends on store support)

optional_parameters.name: sortBy
optional_parameters.description:
Criteria to sort the list by, possible values -

- Deal Rating
- Title
- Savings
- Price
- Metacritic
- Reviews
- Release
- Store
- recent

optional_parameters.name: AAA
optional_parameters.description:
Default `0`

Flag to include only deals with retail price > `$29`

optional_parameters.name: pageSize
optional_parameters.description: The size of pages returned, default and maximum value is `60`

optional_parameters.name: exact
optional_parameters.description:
Default `0`

Flag to allow only exact string match for `title` parameter

optional_parameters.name: upperPrice
optional_parameters.description: Only returns deals with a price* less than or equal to` this value (`50` acts the same as no limit)

optional_parameters.name: pageNumber
optional_parameters.description: The requested page number, 0 indexed, default of `0`

optional_parameters.name: onSale
optional_parameters.description:
Default `0`

Flag to include only games that are currently on sale

optional_parameters.name: metacritic
optional_parameters.description: Minimum Metacritic rating for a game

optional_parameters.name: storeID
optional_parameters.description: Comma separated list of store ID's to filter on, omit for deals from any store

api_list.name: Game Lookup
api_list.description: Gets info for a specific game. Response includes a list of all deals associated with the game.

api_list.name: Edit Alert
api_list.description: Set or remove a price alert.

required_parameters.name: action
required_parameters.description: The action to take on the price alert (`set` or `delete`)

required_parameters.name: price
required_parameters.description: The price to wait for, only required when using `set` value for `action` parameter

api_list.name: Deal Lookup
